name: CircleAvatar
desc: A circle that represents a user.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color with which to fill the circle. Changing the background color will cause the avatar to animate to the new color.

fields.name: foregroundColor
fields.desc: The default text color for text in the circle.

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.desc: The background image of the circle. Changing the background image will cause the avatar to animate to the new image.

fields.name: foregroundImage
fields.desc: The foreground image of the circle.

fields.name: onBackgroundImageError
fields.desc: An optional error callback for errors emitted when loading [backgroundImage].

fields.name: onForegroundImageError
fields.desc: An optional error callback for errors emitted when loading [foregroundImage].

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: The size of the avatar, expressed as the radius (half the diameter).

fields.name: minRadius
fields.desc: The minimum size of the avatar, expressed as the radius (half the diameter).

fields.name: maxRadius
fields.desc: The maximum size of the avatar, expressed as the radius (half the diameter).
